name: Aluna Rash Neoprene Vest
description:
The first ever collection of products that can be used ‘on-the-water’ as well as ‘in-the-water.’

After years of creating and designing market-leading open water swim wetsuits, we have noticed an increased growth in other open air water sports, more specifically the sport of Stand Up Paddleboarding.

Stand Up Paddleboarding is one of the fastest growing water sports across the world at the moment and it’s easy to see why. It’s one of the most relaxing sports and can also be used as a way to help develop core stability and upper body strength. With that, we’ve decided to create a range of products that can be used for SUP, swimming and open water sports in general.

Stand Up Paddleboarding is an activity that is so enjoyable that you can end up working out for hours, where comfort and durability are paramount. We have strategically incorporated our most flexible neoprene panels to keep you comfortable, no matter how long you’re out, or how long your adventure.

THE DETAILS:
External reinforced pockets.
Our finest neoprene for flexibility.
Strategically located durability panels.
Soft-feel neck line.

name: Womens Response 3/2mm Bolero Wetsuit Jacket
description:
Gul Reponse jacket with a full front zipper for extra easy on/off. Using a combination of 3mm X-FLEX and RS-Flex neoprene. Thermospan chest and lower kidney panels for excellent wind resistance and improved core warmth. Comfortable flatlock seams.

Construction: Flatlock
Features: Mesh
Lining: Thermospan
Neoprene: D-Flex, RS- Flex, X-Flex

name: Neoprene Hooded Wetsuit Vest
description:
Ultimate Warmth In The Open Water

The Hooded Neoprene Vest is a multi-function garment that can be layered up or used on its own. Whether you wear this under your wetsuit to add an additional layer and provide that extra warmth to keep you in the water during those coldest winter months, or wear as a singular item over swimwear in the summer, it’s a perfect addition to your open water wardrobe.

The super stretch four-way lined neoprene creates a soft and comfortable fit without impeding your swim stoke, providing a perfect solution to cold water races such as the Norseman Triathlon.

name: Womens Peeky 1mm Wetsuit Jacket
description:
With 1mm of premium, recycled neoprene and custom design, the Billabong Peeky Jacket keeps the chill off and the your style going strong. Part of the Billabong Surf Capsule Collection, the women's long sleeve surf jacket embraces vintage design with a center front zip, adding on custom printed or colorblocked panels. Constantly resurfaced with fresh prints, and now recycled, the 2mm women’s wetsuit top is made from premium Recycled Superlight neoprene, a lightweight foam made partially from recycled car tires and neoprene scraps, topped with 100% recycled Superflex jersey, creating flexibility alongside sustainability. The Peeky Neoprene Jacket is finished with non-toxic water based adhesive and flatlock stitch construction for comfort and durability.

THE DETAILS:
Women’s Wetsuit Top
1MM thickness
Style: Long sleeve wetsuit jacket
Exterior Fabric Type: 100% recycled Superflex jersey
Foam: Superlight foam made from partially recycled material
Interior fabric: Silicon stretch lining
Center front zipper
Seams: Flatlock stitched external seams; soft, flexible and durable
Wetsuit size depends on height and weight, check the size chart for the best fit
MATERIALS:
80% Neoprene, 10% Nylon, 10% Polyester

description:
The Solace range has become a firm favourite amongst women who value quality combined with style. The feminine cut flatters while the continually changing artwork panels add a real distinctive and exciting feel to the range. This flatlock vest is perfect for those warmer days on the water.

THE DETAILS:
100% Xtend neoprene
Flatlocked seams
Front quarter zip
True Thickness

name: Womens Zenlite 1.5mm Flatlock Neoprene Top
description:
Technology:
Thermal protection technology
4 way stretch
50+ UV protection
Features:
Low friction and soft touch Glideskin neck seal offers comfort and reduces water ingress
Low profile wrist seals with slik grip cuff prints
1.5mm limestone Neoprene
Flatlocked seams for comfort


Fabric Composition:
90% Neoprene, 10% Nylon

name: Womens Zentherm 2.5mm GBS Neoprene Top
description:
The Women's ZenTherm Top was designed by our experts to deliver the perfect balance between performance and comfort. Constructed from a 2.5mm Ecoflex limestone Neoprene with thermal protection technology, this suit is ideal for colder temperatures. With 4- way stretch and printed slik grip on the cuffs, the glideskin neck seal reduces water ingress. The ZenTherm Top is ideal for sailing, paddlesports or boardsports such as stand up paddleboarding, kayaking or windsurfing. Compatible with the ZenTherm Skiff Suit.
Technology:
Thermal protection technology
4 way stretch
Features:
Zoned Neoprene technology
2.5mm Ecoflex limestone Neoprene
Glideskin neck seal
Glued and blindstitched construction with critical neoprene taped seams
Water repellent plush lining for extra warmth
Slik grip cuff prints
Helioflex, thermal, quick dry water repellent lining panels
Fabric Composition:
90% Neoprene, 10% Nylon

name: Code Zero 3mm GBS Thermotop
description:
The 3MM CodeZero Top features our latest material and wetsuit technologies to produce our most durable, flexible and warmest wetsuit top ever. Combining 3mm PINSTR||PE super stretch thermal insulating neoprene throughout with our fast-drying nobel prize GRAPHENEX fleece lining. Designed to keep you super warm in the coldest conditions, making it an essential top for performing at your peak when the temperatures are at their lowest. Combine it with our CODEZERO Long-Johns for full body protection and warmth

THE DETAILS:
Titanium 2: Reflects heat back in
Windproof and waterproof
50+ UVA and UVB protection
Tech-neck: Single layer glide-skin neck seal
Glide skin: Hem seal
 CONSTRUCTION: 
Blindstitched: Seam construction
Lava ripstop: X-Flex hydrophobic ( i.e. doesn’t hold h2o ) material: providing a full body Windbreaker in the water.
15% lighter than x-flex neoprene
Graphene x: boldry-x thermal wicking back kidney panels

name: Womens Code Zero 1mm Wetsuit Top
description:
Thermospan insulates core body panels the Code Zero top can be worn alone or to form part of a layering system. Titanium 2-lined thermal neoprene reflects the heat back in keeping you warm whilst out on the water. This top really is a versatile garment in both warm and cold water conditions, being windproof and water-resistant as well as providing 50+ UVA and UVB protection. A great edition to all watersports enthusiasts kit. Featuring new colourway and graphics.

THE DETAILS:
Titanium 2: Reflects heat back in.
Windproof and Water-resistant
50+ UVA & UVB protection
Tech-neck: Single layer glide-skin neck seal.
Glide skin - waist seal.
Flatlock seam construction
FX:Lite - Silky smooth, hydrophobic material, providing wind chill protection in the water. 15% lighter than x-flex neoprene
FX-Lite Thermal ultimate insulation & warmth

name: Womens Luna7 Front Zip Wetsuit Jacket
description:
X-FLEX: 150% super-stretch- warm, ultra-light & flexible
THERMOBAMBOO: Extend lining

name: Womens Porto 2mm Wetsuit Jacket
description:
Protect yourself from the cold with the Jobe Porto 2mm Jacket Women. This 2mm of full stretch neoprene jacket features ultra durable flatlock seams and a front zipper for fast and easy entry. The Porto Jacket 2MM can be paired with the Porto Long John for ultimate warmth and style.

THE DETAILS:
50% limestone based neoprene: lighter, flexible and more durable
2 mm supreme stretch neoprene
Durable flatlock seams
Feminine fit
Front zipper for fast entry

name: Womens Foiling 4mm Thermohot Long Sleeve Top SWTS003
description:
Super stretch neoprene is 4mm thick on the body and 3mm on the sides and lower sleeves for maximum freedom of movem

This Championship ThermoHOT Neoprene Top has been constructed from super stretch 4mm neoprene (5mm including the neoprene backer and face thicknesses) for unrestricted freedom of movement and truly outstanding warmth in wintry waters. For enhanced comfort, the garment features Glideskin at the neck and ergonomic seams that are taped for watertight seal. Laser cut cuffs provide a seam-free opening and the lycra bound hem provides a comfort fit that stays in place. Wear it with a sleeveless wetsuit or under a smock for added insulation.

Super stretch neoprene is 4mm thick on the body and 3mm on the sides and lower sleeves for maximum freedom of movement
No underarm seams for complete comfort
Glideskin neoprene at the neck allows easy donning and removal and adds comfort
Grid fleece lining at the chest and back for added warmth
Scooped back hem for added coverage when active
Seams are ergonomically placed to not cross any stress points for maximum freedom of movement and durability
Neoprene seam taped internally for an improved seal
Laser cut cuffs for a comfortable, seamless cuff
Striking sulphur spring colour on the inside so it looks great even when drying inside-out
Composition
80% Neoprene, 20% Polyamide
Care instructions

Do not tumble dry
Hand wash cold
Do not dry clean
Do not bleach
Do not iron
Hand wash only

description:
Sometimes we're faced with unpredictable conditions which is why the Lunar Long Sleeve Vest makes for the ideal wetsuit top. Versatile by nature, this long-sleeved vest can be mixed and matched with various bottoms all the while keeping your core covered and warm.

THE DETAILS:
M-stitch
Non slip cuffs
100% M-Flex

name: Womens 1.5mm Loose Fit Splash Wetsuit SUP Top
description:
THE DETAILS:

The Prolimt Loose Fit Splash SUP top is the top for your cold paddle sessions. Featuring a PU coated outside for warmth and complete windblock, Prolimit’s air ventilation side panel for a snug fit and breathability and full front zip for heat regulation.

PU coated with plush inside
Windchill optimized
Air ventilation panels

name: Womens 1.5mm Wetsuit Zipped SUP Hoody
description:
The Prolimt Womens Zipped SUP Hoody is the best for your colder paddle sessions. The perfect panel layout and using the highest quality neoprene materials for your paddle sessions. Features Prolimit’s Airflex 550+ for snug fit and movability, longer arm and thumb pocket. The Prolimit SUP hoody neoprene is windchill optimized top for serious cold water conditions.

FEATURES:

Airflex 550+
Zodiac lining
Flatlock construction
YKK zipper

description:
Zhik Womens Microfleece V 1mm Neoprene Long Sleeve Top

name: Womens Superwarm V Neoprene Top
description:
The new Zhik Superwarm® V range is the next step in Zhik's revolutionary wetsuit collection. The V range offers a streamlined approach to wetsuit design, featuring a 3D body-mapped and ergonomic fit that moves with your body.

The 3-2mm neoprene construction provides warmth in even the coldest conditions, and the targeted super-stretch panelling in the upper body allows for supreme comfort and flexibility where you need it.

Targeted super stretch panelling for optimum fit.
Enhanced shoulder stretch.
3D body mapped fit.
Glued and Blind Stitched.

name: Womens Summer 1.5mm Flatlock Racing Neoprene Vest
description:
100% M-Flex 1.5mm neoprene vest is ideal for wet, active boats in moderate-weather conditions. Soft neoprene and clever thickness distribution have been used in the design to improve performance. Can be worn as a single layer against the skin, or as an outer layer for extra wind protection. Combine with a Long John in boats where manoeuvrability.

THE DETAILS:
Flatlock stitching
Clever thickness distribution for added comfort and manoeuvrability
Can be worn as a base layer or as part of a layering system
MATERIALS:
M-Flex 100% Neoprene
Thermowarm quickdry lining
Xtend lining

name: Womens Syncro 1mm Front Zip Paddle Jacket
Womens XWR Pro Sailing Top
description:
XWR tops provide quality water repellent clothing for yachting, dinghy sailing and active sports on the water.  Designed with a high stretch and super lightweight woven fabric that simply bounces water off it, helping shield you against wind and water chill, while keeping you dry. Breathable so you don’t over sweat and with UPF 50+ sun protection these comfortable and soft tech tops are great for high performance activities.

Highly water repellent top that shields against the elements, preventing wind and water chill.
Performance fit with a raglan cut for use in high activity sports.
High stretch woven fabric for additional comfort and manoeuvrability.
Breathable and super lightweight, keeping you comfortable in high performance activities.
UPF 50+ Protection from the sun’s harmful rays.
Soft and smooth for the ultimate comfort.
High collar for extra sun protection.

name: Womens Ultimate 1.5mm Long Sleeve Flatlock Neoprene Vest
description:
70% M-Flex 1.5mm neoprene vest; is ideal for wet, active boats in moderate-weather conditions. Airprene flowzone on the back provides an additional cooling feature for maximum comfort and breathability. Soft neoprene and clever thickness distribution have been used in the design to improve performance. Can be worn as a single layer against the skin, or as an outer layer for extra wind and water protection. Specifically designed for female sailors’ comfort with clever thickness distribution and panel layout. Combine with a long john or the new “Ultimate neoprene pants” to create the perfect outfit.

Flatlock stitching
Airprene flow zone on back
Clever thickness distribution for added comfort and manoeuvrability
Can be worn as a base layer or as part of a layering system
Contoured shape for a female figure
M-Flex 70% Neoprene
Airprene
Fine mesh chest

name: Womens Foiling 1.5mm Thermocool Long Sleeve Top SWTS001
description:
Made from 1.5mm (2.5mm thickness including the neoprene backer and face thickness) from super-stretch neoprene

Made from 1.5mm (2.5mm thickness including the neoprene backer and face thickness) from super-stretch neoprene, this incredibly engineered garment features a scooped hem that covers your lower back as you bend. Strategically placed seams ensure an ergonomic fit while avoiding stress points for a greater degree of durability and enhanced freedom of movement. Layer under a sleeveless wetsuit or complete your outfit with Deck Shield Pants.

1.5mm super stretch neoprene for maximum freedom of movement and a streamlined fit
Scooped back hem for added coverage when active
No underarm or side seams for maximum comfort and movement
Seams are ergonomically placed to not cross any stress points for maximum freedom of movement and durability
Striking sulphur spring colour on the inside so it looks great even when drying inside-out
Composition
80% Neoprene, 20% Polyamide
Care instructions

Do not tumble dry
Hand wash cold
Do not dry clean
Do not bleach
